website_summaries.verdict: Samsung's Gear VR headset becomes much more usable with a handheld controller, but finding good virtual reality content is frustrating.
pros: Compatible with Galaxy S6, S7, S8, and Note 5

customer_reviews.title: A whole new experience
customer_reviews.text: It's important to get the correct version of headset to work with your mobile.Ex my VR was compatible with my Samsung Galaxy S9+ But the box it arrived in gave S8 max. The important information is the version on the User Manual, mine is SM-R325. One or two more snags then plain sailing. Its a delight with loads of stuff to explore. Oculus recommends contact lens for those needing glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gear VR
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic thing. I'm the 1st time VR gooles user, but what a fantastic thing. You can see place you've never travelled and feels like you are actually there. Also games aren't bad as well. Tried an interactive video and it felt so real. Rollecoaster even if not real turned my stomak upside down :-) It felt so real :-) Really interesting thing with lot of potencial. Played with that for few hours and it juiced my galaxy s9+ to half. So not bad considering non stop video and sound playing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Kokes

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, easy to use and fits over glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It takes my Galaxy Note 8 which is nice. Good quality, easy to use and fits over glasses which is a nice touch. The quality of apps is fairly poor (not the fault of the headset itself). The focus is just a little bit out, even with my glasses on and gives a mild headache after 2 hours (eg. when watching a movie). The controller is good but needs resetting now and then (which takes about 5 seconds). A good little piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Barry N

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price works well on my Galaxy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price works well on my Galaxy S8+. The VR headset comes with Oculus which interface is easy to use some games are free and there is a lot of content free. The 3d is very realistic and depending on quality of depends how sharp the image is. There is some low quality VR stuff out there which spoils the expeirence. Look for HD or 4k and you can't go wrong. You may also purchase games films etc The controller is a bit dificult to centralise the screen. The rest of it is ok and easy to use. Just ordered a game pad so will try that to see if easier to control.
customer_reviews.author: D Bowron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent VR headset if you have recent Samsung smart phone
customer_reviews.text: I used this Samsung Gear VR with my Samsung Galaxy S8 smartphone and it's superb. The S8's OLED (not LCD) screen with high pixel count gives amazing results - better than Oculus Go and Google Cardboard etc. The bluetooth controller is useful but not always necessary and sometimes it's easier to just use touchpad on headset. The S8 has fast processor and works with hundereds of VR games. It also works with older Samsungs but the newer the phone the better. Great item but careful you don't break rear phone glass cover when attaching to hinge - i did after just a dozen uses.
customer_reviews.author: Nitroman

customer_reviews.title: Insanely good fun!
customer_reviews.text: Oh what fun! I had put off buying this because I couldn't justify the cost in case I hated it. I needn't have worried, this is a fantastic little gadget. Also I was afraid that it would make me horribly dizzy, but it's not bad at all. Although I do recommend regular breaks as it can be tough on the eyes. Honestly this is so much fun I wish I'd bought it sooner.

customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this..for two weeks now it's gathering dust on their shelves 😫. Great price though and it arrived quickly. I think I just need to swap my fickle kids who nagged me for this for three months.
